main event: A diamond-shaped object was observed hovering and rotating in the sky near Pecos, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as being 10 ft wide and 75 ft long, Bright and shiny like aluminum, The object climbed 2,000 ft and then veered off to the northwest, The observation lasted for about 5 minutes, The source of the report was considered unreliable.
witness description: The witness reported the object was hovering and moving slowly.
